text: Hi! PARIS is a French artificial intelligence (AI) research laboratory.HEC et Polytechnique lancent le centre pluridisciplinaire Hi! Paris pour devenir champions de la recherche en IA It has been made up in 2020 by HEC Paris and the Polytechnic Institute of Paris.HEC Paris lance Hi! Paris avec l’Institut Polytechnique de Paris It has two main subjects : business and society.Hi!Paris, L’Institut Polytechnique De Paris Et HEC Paris Affichent Leur Ambition Dans L’IA ==References== ==Further reading== * Hi!
